column4: I'm looking now, but I'm having a heck of a time searching and getting it to actually give me results. Which packages do I need?
you will need the package which says kernel-2.6.24-11-image
I think you would need to check with synaptics what packages you have installed
ok, I'll try to find those. Not terribly familiar w/ the launchpad site.
let me give you some pointers...
you start here: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu

I can find files for the current version, but not the old one :( I did find linux-image-2.6.24-11-generic_2.6.24-11.17_i386.deb, but I can'd find the matching linux-ubuntu-modules :( I can onlhy find 1=6
this is really strange...
I think I found it!
check it out: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+publishinghistory
from there you get this page: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/2.6.24-11.17/+build/527730
Cool! ty
Can't seem to find the .deb though? :/
should be those resulting binaries links.
but I also don't find the ubuntu-modules you were looking for :(
Yeah /
Sorry, had to reboot. Dont suppose you found anything? I still haven't
found it: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-ubuntu-modules-2.6.24/+publishinghistory
https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/hardy/i386/linux-ubuntu-modules-2.6.24-11-386/2.6.24-11.15
There we go! man that was hard to find. thanks!!
Great! I'm glad we can find it! good luck!
Yeah, hopefully this kernel will fix some of the issues. 2.6.24-16 won't boot, but 2.6.20 has some bugs that affect me :(
:( It's sad -26 isn't working for you
